member.name: WinRT.MetaDataGetDispenser
member.param: The interface to implement. This parameter can be either IID_IMetaDataDispenser or IID_IMetaDataDispenserEx.
The dispenser class. The class implements IMetaDataDispenser or IMetaDataDispenserEx.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
